title: How can we explore what technologies a website was developed with? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check the following tools  BuiltWith - Web Technology Profilerdetect which CMS a website is usingSites InfoGuess - CMS DetectorFind out what CMS a site is using.If your are using firefox, try apalyzer addon with your firefox browser. It will help you serve the purpose.In order to install go to the following link: Wappalyzer
